title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - India and Luxembourg: Strengthening Ties in Fintech, Space, and AI
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: AI gives a clearer picture of functional MRI brain data
description: Obtaining clearer functional MRI data about the brain and its disorders is possible using artificial intelligence, according to Boston College researchers who report in Nature Methods that they have developed an AI-assisted method to remove "noise," or image distortions, caused by movement, heartbeat, and other factors.
content: Obtaining clearer functional MRI data about the brain and its disorders is possible using artificial intelligence, according to Boston College researchers who report in Nature Methods that they have developed an AI-assisted method to remove "noise," ... [2462 chars]

title: Universal, Nvidia Join Hands For AI Music Creation, Discovery
description: Universal Music Group NV is partnering with Nvidia Corp. to boost the role of artificial intelligence in music discovery, creation, as record labels seek to capitalize on the technology while managing the risks AI poses to their catalogs. The collaboration between the world’s largest record label and leading AI chipmaker is the first of its kind. The partnership will focus on using AI to improve the way fans discover music and engage with artists beyond current search and personalization tools

title: Samsung likely to flag 160% jump in Q4 profit as AI boom stokes chip prices
description: SEOUL — Samsung Electronics is expected to flag a 160-percent jump in its fourth-quarter (Q4) operating profit spurred by a severe chip shortage that has sharply driven up memory prices as customers scramble to meet booming demand for artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Microsoft works with major US electric grid operator to modernize the Midwest power system
description: The U.S. Midwest grid has teamed up with Microsoft , it said on Tuesday, in the latest instance of Big Tech turning to collaboration to help ensure the massive amounts of electricity needed for artificial intelligence are available.
content: Over the last two years, the U.S. technology industry has deepened ties with the power sector by locking into long-term supply agreements and providing AI assistance to maximize supplies as energy-intensive data centers propel U.S. power demand to re... [1107 chars]

title: Nimbus, Lilly sign deal to develop new oral obesity drug
description: Nimbus Therapeutics said on Tuesday it has entered into a multi-year research and licensing agreement with Eli Lilly to develop artificial intelligence-driven new oral treatments for obesity and other metabolic diseases.

title: Marvell to buy networking equipment firm XConn in $540 million deal amid AI infrastructure push
description: Jan 6 (Reuters) - Marvell Technology ‌said on Tuesday it will buy networking equipment provider XConn Technologies ‌in a deal worth about $540 million, as the chipmaker doubles ‌down on data center hardware amid a race to expand artificial intelligence infrastructure.
